query:
SELECT
            m.content as "content",
            c.name as "name",
            m.role as "role"
        FROM
            "ChatMessage" m
        JOIN
            "Chat" c on c."id" = m."chatId"
        WHERE
            m.id = $1 AND m."chatId" = $2 AND c."deletedAt" IS NULL AND c."isPersistent" = false
